name: Squirrel Plan
description:
Squirrel Plan is a little arcade game ?

 Cheat sheet for crafts:

  • Balloon + String
  • Balloon + String + Feather
  • Feather + Feather
  • Feather
  • Spoon + Elastic
  • Spoon + Elastic + Leaf
  • Kite + Friend squirrel + String
  • Kite
  • Tortoise + Carrot + String
  • Tortoise

Made by Nicolas Valentin and Meadjix with the support of Ectevy for musics.
